Subject: Announcing JFCUnit 0.1 beta
Date: Thu, 28 Jun 2001 22:00:42 +0100

From: Matt Caswell <m.caswell@...>

As mentioned previously on this lists there is a new project known as
JFCUnit available on sourceforge:

http://sourceforge.net/projects/jfcunit

JFCUnit enables you to write test cases for Java Swing based applications.
It provides support for: 
* Obtaining handles on Windows opened by your code 
* Locating components within a component hierarchy 
* Raising events on components, e.g. clicking a button 
* Handling testing of components in a thread safe manner 

A "Getting Started" document is available here:
http://sourceforge.net/docman/display_doc.php?docid=5200&group_id=28662

The first public release of this is now available for download:
http://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/jfcunit/jfcunit.zip

JFCUnit is actively looking for developers to join the project. If you are
interested in becoming involved then please join the jfcunit-devel mailing
list. See link below for details:
http://sourceforge.net/mail/?group_id=28662


Matt
subject: Announcing JFCUnit 0.1 beta
